problem_names: lemma productdivides: "\<lbrakk>x mod a = (0::nat); x mod b = 0; prime a; prime b; a \<noteq> b\<rbrakk> \<Longrightarrow> x mod (a*b) = 0"

lemma specializedtoprimes1: 
  fixes p::nat 
  shows "\<lbrakk>prime p; prime q; p \<noteq> q; a mod p = b mod p ; a mod q = b mod q\<rbrakk>
         \<Longrightarrow> a mod (p*q) = b mod (p*q)"

lemma specializedtoprimes1a:
  fixes p::nat 
  shows "\<lbrakk>prime p; prime q; p \<noteq> q; a mod p = b mod p; a mod q = b mod q; b < p*q \<rbrakk>
    \<Longrightarrow> a mod (p*q) = b"
translations: lemma productdivides: "\<lbrakk>x mod a = (0::nat); x mod b = 0; prime a; prime b; a \<noteq> b\<rbrakk> \<Longrightarrow> x mod (a*b) = 0"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<lbrakk>x mod a = 0; x mod b = 0; prime a; prime b;
     a \<noteq> b\<rbrakk>
    \<Longrightarrow> x mod (a * b) = 0

lemma specializedtoprimes1: 
  fixes p::nat 
  shows "\<lbrakk>prime p; prime q; p \<noteq> q; a mod p = b mod p ; a mod q = b mod q\<rbrakk>
         \<Longrightarrow> a mod (p*q) = b mod (p*q)"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<lbrakk>prime p; prime q; p \<noteq> q; a mod p = b mod p;
     a mod q = b mod q\<rbrakk>
    \<Longrightarrow> a mod (p * q) = b mod (p * q)

lemma specializedtoprimes1a:
  fixes p::nat 
  shows "\<lbrakk>prime p; prime q; p \<noteq> q; a mod p = b mod p; a mod q = b mod q; b < p*q \<rbrakk>
    \<Longrightarrow> a mod (p*q) = b"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<lbrakk>prime p; prime q; p \<noteq> q; a mod p = b mod p;
     a mod q = b mod q; b < p * q\<rbrakk>
    \<Longrightarrow> a mod (p * q) = b
